snippet: The Army said Wednesday that it would continue to open its elite Ranger School to all soldiers regardless of gender, after two women passed the grueling leadership course.
abstract: US Army Ranger School will continue to accept soldiers regardless of gender following two-year old policy opening front-line combat positions to women.
lead_paragraph: The Army said Wednesday that it would continue to open its elite Ranger School to all soldiers regardless of gender, after two women passed the grueling leadership course.

headline.main: Ranger School Will Remain Open to Women
headline.print_headline: Ranger School Will Remain Open to Women

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
